title: 感謝祭現折TWD1200｜苗栗｜藍鵲渡假莊園｜合掌村＆小木屋＆露營車＆免搭帳露營體驗
reviews:
[{'id': 6604489, 'author': 'Ming Chi', 'date': '2021-10-22 14:44:37', 'avatar': 'ac7548cc9a3e4fe461d9612814052ce3.jpg', 'author_id': 3106849, 'rating': 80, 'content': '給如有訂購的朋友建議，在前往莊園前，最好能先致電莊園確認搭帳的位置，避免不必要的困擾。好在到了現場莊園幫我們調整了較舒適位置！感謝！整個莊園讓小朋友消耗體力的設施蠻多的！有沙坑、溜滑梯、盪鞦韆、戲水池、運動場和高爾夫球練習場等，很適合一家大小和結伴朋友一同前來遊玩！想體驗露營這免搭帳一卡皮箱就可以來了！真的很輕鬆愉快，吃的問題也不用煩惱唷！很棒！', 'language': 'zh_TW', 'translate_content': 'If you have ordered a friend, it is recommended that before going to the manor, it is best to call the manor to confirm the location of the account to avoid unnecessary trouble. title: 感謝祭8折起｜高雄｜遠山望月溫泉風呂露營區｜溫泉露營車・豪華狩獵帳
reviews:
[{'id': 6680158, 'author': '', 'date': '2021-11-25 15:31:35', 'avatar': 'avatar.png', 'author_id': 107789813, 'rating': 60, 'content': '整潔度不佳，不管是自家帳棚外的桌椅或是公共區域的桌椅都讓人不想坐下來，少了放鬆渡假的氛圍，還是露營就該帶些髒髒感？馬桶一沖水就從底座漏水，淋浴的熱水也偏溫，如果天氣再冷些恐怕會著涼，還好帳棚內有暖氣，洗手台也沒有附肥皂或洗手液，要洗個手還得去淋浴間取沐浴乳，加價的晚餐份量夠多，但在個很小的桌子，用個很小的爐子烤肉真心冏，早餐東西不多，還算可口。大眾池我們去的那天只到7點，但櫃台人員並沒有告知，雖然還是讓我們去泡，但就是跟著一片片保溫棉一起泡，真是此生難得一見的泡湯風情', 'language': 'zh_TW', 'translate_content': 'The cleanliness is not good. Whether it is the tables and chairs outside your tent or the tables and chairs in the public area, you don’t want to sit down, lack the atmosphere of relaxing and vacation, or should camping bring some dirty feeling? The toilet leaks from the base as soon as the toilet is flushed, and the hot water in the shower is also relatively warm. If the weather is colder, I am afraid it will catch cold. Fortunately, there is heating in the tent, and the washbasin does not have soap or hand sanitizer. You have to wash your hands. Go to the shower room to get the shower gel. The extra dinner is enough, but at a very small table, I use a small stove to barbecue the meat. The breakfast is not much, and it is delicious. We went to the public pool until 7 o’clock on the day, but the staff at the counter did not tell. Although we were still allowed to soak, it was just soaked with pieces of thermal insulation cotton. 帳篷內很乾淨，裡面外面都有架燈條。
帳篷後面就有水槽，烤肉的時候也很方便。
廁所跟淋浴間都很乾淨很大。
晚上蚊子較多，會提供蚊香。
早餐的熱壓吐司很好吃，但飲料還好。
晚上睡覺時車聲、人聲、狗叫聲會比較明顯。
園區也會提供耳塞。
整體來說CP值算高。', 'language': 'zh_TW', 'translate_content': 'The camping area not far from the city is easy to reach by car. The inside of the tent is very clean, with light bars inside and outside. There is a sink behind the tent, which is convenient for barbecues. The toilets and shower rooms are very clean and large. There are more mosquitoes at night and mosquito coils will be provided. The hot-pressed toast for breakfast was delicious, but the drinks were good. The sound of cars, people, and dog barking will be more pronounced when you sleep at night. The park will also provide earplugs. '我們的選擇是京都居酒屋，到達後房內沒有間隔，已備有卡拉ok 及雪櫃設備。燒烤在房外屋後，有餐台自成一角。食物好味，我地剛用完三千作十五分量👏🏼

團體感受：
人多真的不用買燒烤义，用提供的食物家夾即可（大前題有幾個廚師跟場）
場內環境企理，有遊戲空間。加分。
包五小時，覺得不夠玩
我們的房間沒有個別洗手間，要多行幾步，希望機構可在戶外多加水喉洗手。
買食物可用手機下單，如不用一次過訂處，而可以彈性就好。
可能因為假期關係，很多食物在訂單上並沒有列明或已售光。

'房間有特色，而且每間不一樣，整體環境配上陽光都幾靚，適合打卡，營內也算多小朋友設施， 對小朋友來說是天地，有單車可踩，bbq 食物尚可

但值得留意幾點：
窗有三個，如圖， 但其中最右邊嘅一個係無得落窗簾無得推開， 夜晚瞓覺嘅時候出面嘅大燈係會開住，光線直射入房內，有點難入睡
如果有窗簾會更好


洗手間內沒有掛鉤， 無法把衣服掛牆，而坐廁的 衛生一般， 進去的時候會有灰色的水在坐廁上， 雖然已經抹乾淨， 但不敢放在坐廁上， 而且坐廁非常窄小， 然後又想衣服可以放在客廳外， 但廁所外對著的位置也有兩個上窗（上圖），而客廳外的窗是無法拉廉的
如果在廁所裏安裝掛鉤讓客人方便掛衣服會更好

而且非常多蚊，很容易走入房間內，不過幸好當晚入睡時，已拍打了幾隻，睡時沒有嗡嗡嗡

但一大早，陽光便會直射入床，因為沒有窗簾，7點多便醒了，無法再睡

洗手盤有小蟑螂', 'language': 'zh_HK', 'translate_content': "The rooms are unique, and each room is different. The overall environment is beautiful with sunshine, suitable for punching in. It’s better for guests to hang clothes and there are many mosquitoes. It’s easy to walk into the room. Fortunately, when they fell asleep that night, they had slapped a few, and there was no buzzing when they slept. title: 浪高長岸豪華露營/ 露營車+水上活動體驗（大嶼山長沙）
what_we_love: 在海上活動天堂 - 浪高長岸體驗不同水上活動。中心還提供豪華露營、露營車和燒烤設施，此外也可到中心門外的長沙沙灘玩獨木舟、人體衝浪板、淺水衝浪板、滑浪風帆、軟身滑浪板及直立滑浪板。中心也有早餐及小童娛樂設施。快跟家人朋友來享受消暑刺激的夏日度假！

'Heard of storm warning from the weather forecast and checked with the staff but still not refundable nor can change the dates, which is quite upsetting to know spending all the money and might have to stay in the tent for the whole time.
Shower and toilet are combined in those portable toilets.
We all woke up multiple times because of the noises from outside the tent.
The pillow and beddings have yellow patches and mold stains.
Beach is clean, but lots of rocks when you try to dip your feet into the water, can barely walk, safer if wear paddle shoes.
It is fun to see cow chilling on the beach and they are quite friendly.
Overall, it’s a good experience to have!', 'language': 'en_BS', 'translate_content': 'Heard of storm warning from the weather forecast and checked with the staff but still not refundable nor can change the dates, which is quite upsetting to know spending all the money and might have to stay in the tent for the whole time.

Staff were helpful, fluent in English.

Check in @longcoast sea sport, cheung sa lower village, which is.right on the beach. You can store your stuff on site and they provide you with locker (per tent) to lock up valuables whilst you go do your activities before you can check in to your tent at  5pm. 

Tent size was large enough for 4, consist of air conditioning (we didn't use), at  check in they will provide you with insect repellent plug, hand sanitizer, air conditioning remote control, you can take a hairdryer to use for the night, we also rented a kettle hkd30~though we didn't use it) ~return all the stuff when you check out at 12 next day. They will also provide toilet paper ~which they will put into your shower/toilet cubicle (private cubicle per tent in a communal area~so.bring outdoor slippers and a coat). Water was cold (could be cos we used it at similar times other people in the same area) so suggest to use at a.non.popular time. Inside the tent a mattress, duvet and pillow is provided, plugs are inside so you can charge your phone. Basic but sufficient.

Dog friendly~ can bring your pup (for additional 100hkd) 

Bbq food is sufficient~ bought as add on. Outdoor benches provided so you can enjoy your bbq.

From Klook Review Team", 'review_time': '2021-09-07 11:19:53', 'language': 'en_US', 'translate_language': 'en_US'}, 'review_image': None, 'activity_id': 45316, 'has_admin_display_info': False, 'like_count': 0, 'has_liked': False, 'ticket_id': 247964968, 'package_name': '3人水上活動代用券 + 露營車（星期日至五）', 'start_time': '2021-03-01T00:00:00Z', 'china_railway_info': None}, {'id': 6502778, 'author': 'Hing Ting', 'date': '2021-08-12 10:06:14', 'avatar': 'f3d3aabc--e-h.jpg', 'author_id': 1962787, 'rating': 80, 'content': '我與家人渡過了愉快的三日兩夜，雖然遇著三號風球天氣不太穩定，但幸好間中也遇著有陽光藍天白雲的時候，很享受放鬆的感覺。
整體來說環境很不錯，很有渡假的感覺，只是露營車裏的設備比較殘舊和空間較細小，不要有太大期望。車內有小雪櫃，提供熱水壺、風筒、洗潔精、廁紙，其他東西全部要自備。
我們自備了食物去燒烤，付了$250開爐費，包兩包炭，足夠燒兩天。另外會提供兩個gas爐，每天提供兩支gas，有煲和燒烤盤，可以自己煮食。早上可以到櫃檯點早餐，有腿蛋治和一杯飲品。沿著海灘還有幾間餐廳，價錢不算便宜但可接受。
水上活動方面包玩滑浪板、直立板和獨木舟，但因天氣不好大浪，所以只能讓我們玩滑浪板，其他都沒有機會玩。
整體來說自己比較推薦露營車，雖然車內設備比較殘舊，但周邊環境比南非營好很多，露營車這邊地方較空曠和寧靜，而且場地只有4架車，如想靜靜地放鬆一天挺不錯。', 'language': 'zh_HK', 'translate_content': "I spent three pleasant days and two nights with my family. Although the weather is not stable when encountering Typhoon No. 3, fortunately, there are occasional sunshine, blue sky and white clouds. I really enjoy the feeling of relaxation. On the whole, the environment is very good, and it feels like a vacation, but the equipment in the camper is relatively old and the space is small, so don't have too much expectations. There is a small refrigerator in the car, hot water bottle, hair dryer, detergent, toilet paper are provided, and all other things must be brought by yourself. We brought our own food to the barbecue, paid $250 for the stove, and included two packs of charcoal, enough to cook for two days. In addition, two gas stoves are provided, two gas burners are provided every day, and there are pots and grills, so you can cook by yourself. In the morning, you can order breakfast at the counter, with a leg egg treat and a drink. There are also several restaurants along the beach, the prices are not cheap but acceptable. In terms of water activities, surfboards, stand-up boards and canoes are included, but due to bad weather and big waves, we can only play surfboards, and we have no chance to play other things. On the whole, I recommend campervans. Although the equipment in the vehicle is relatively old, the surrounding environment is much better than that of the South African camp. The campervan is more open and peaceful, and there are only 4 vehicles on the site. If you want to relax for a day quietly pretty good.", 'translate_language': 'en_US', 'need_translate_button': True, 'has_reply': False, 'reply': None, 'review_image': [{'image_id': 7905227, 'img_url': '露營車之旅開始， 喺東沖搭11號車在長沙下村下車，下車後直行數步第一個彎轉入小斜路就會見到相當容易搵。 海灘冇嘢講啦無限可擊， 好靚可能潮退所以覺得好大仲要 閒日冇乜人超正！未有露營車就先食個🍜，小朋友就 衝落沙灘玩 。 老闆 溫馨提示 沙灘會 有少許碎石 最好著對沙灘鞋會比較好。 水上活動任玩連續兩日6時 還會提供locker畀你 very good la! 入露營車時有人會幫你拎行李及帶路招呼周到解釋清晰。車不算大但一定夠3人但 🚽比較細及🚿有少許 滲水 就好在在車內唔使再行出去都算啦！各方面都 乾淨清潔妥當。今晚食BBQ 可以join佢嘅250蚊package亦都可以自己買嘢入去但係就唔包 雪凍， 附近有餐廳 但價錢就……。 露營車門口有兩個 gas爐 可以用嚟bbq及煮嘢食 我就自己買嘢入去燒。 玩到大約十時每架車嘅人都好自律地 安靜唔嘈吵。一早就出沙灘 打卡，好靚仲見到有牛牛，早餐 就食三文治加熱飲 都ok㗎。 有驚喜就是車內有一個小型雪櫃雪飲品ok但雪糕應該唔得。 總括嚟講 全個旅程都好開心地方ok沙灘無敵 職員nice有笑容，係一個好好嘅體驗， 暑假可以玩陽光與海灘，希望可以再來！！！', 'language': 'zh_HK', 'translate_content': "The campervan tour begins. Take bus No. 11 and get off at Xiacun, Changsha. After getting off the bus, go straight for a few steps and turn into a small slope, and you will see that it is quite easy to get around. The beach is infinitely hittable. It's so beautiful that the tide may recede, so I think it's a good time to spend a leisurely day without people being super upright! If you don’t have a camper, you will eat first, and the children will rush down to the beach to play. The owner kindly reminds that there will be some gravel on the beach, it is better to wear beach shoes. Water sports activities will be provided at 6 o'clock for two consecutive days. A locker will be provided to you. Very good la! Someone will help you carry your luggage and lead the way when you enter the camper. The car is not big, but it must be enough for 3 people, but it's relatively thin and has a little water seepage, so it's good if you don't make it out of the car! All aspects are clean and clean. If you eat BBQ tonight, you can join your 250 mosquito package or you can buy it by yourself, but it doesn’t pack snow and ice. There are restaurants nearby but the price is just... There are two gas stoves at the entrance of the camper, which can be used for bbq and cooking. I will just buy them and cook them. By about ten o'clock in the game, everyone in each car is self-disciplined to be quiet and not noisy. I went out on the beach early in the morning to check in. Hao Liangzhong saw cattle and cattle, and had sandwiches and heated drinks for breakfast. The surprise is that there is a small refrigerator in the car. Ice drinks are ok but ice cream should not be available. In short, the whole journey is very happy place ok beach invincible staff nice smile, it is a good experience, summer vacation can play the sun and the beach, hope to come again! ! !", '東涌地鐵站外搭藍色的士到浪高長岸，80元有找。3:30到，職員話可以早啲俾房我們。換衫後立即去玩水上活動，貴重物品可放在免費提供的locker內。晚上大約6:30，職員來準備燒烤爐，食物方面尚可，但以呢個價錢寧願俾250元開爐再自己帶食物燒會更好更豐富。可能天氣入秋，昆蟲多但蚊子不是想像中那麼多，沒用過蚊怕水。另外營地不遠其實有地盤在施工，所以一大清早就有嘈音。營地又近馬路，車聲不絕。加上營與營之間，實在太接近了，所以一點私隱也沒有。剛好碰到一班慶祝生日的住客，我們更是整晚沒睡過。温馨提示，記得帶耳塞，洗頭水沐浴露。唯一加分位是水上活動兩天內任玩。', 'language': 'zh_HK', 'translate_content': 'Take a blue taxi outside the Tung Chung MTR station to Langgao Changan, you can find it for 80 yuan. At 3:30, the staff can take care of us as soon as possible. Go play water sports immediately after changing your shirt. Valuables can be placed in the locker provided for free. At about 6:30 in the evening, the staff came to prepare the barbecue grill. The food was good, but at this price, I would rather open the oven for 250 yuan and bring the food to cook. It would be better and more abundant. Maybe it’s autumn and there are many insects but not as many mosquitoes as expected. I have never used mosquitoes to be afraid of water. In addition, there is actually a construction site not far from the camp, so there is noise early in the morning. The camp was near the road, and the noise of cars was endless. In addition, the camp is too close, so there is no privacy at all. I just ran into a group of guests celebrating their birthdays, and we never slept all night. Warm reminder, remember to bring earplugs, shampoo and shower gel. The only bonus point is that water sports activities can be played within two days.', 'translate_language': 'en_US', 'need_translate_button': True, 'has_reply': False, 'reply': None, 'review_image': '東涌地鐵站外搭藍色的士到浪高長岸，80元有找。3:30到，職員話可以早啲俾房我們。換衫後立即去玩水上活動，貴重物品可放在免費提供的locker內。晚上大約6:30，職員來準備燒烤爐，食物方面尚可，但以呢個價錢寧願俾250元開爐再自己帶食物燒會更好更豐富。可能天氣入秋，昆蟲多但蚊子不是想像中那麼多，沒用過蚊怕水。另外營地不遠其實有地盤在施工，所以一大清早就有嘈音。營地又近馬路，車聲不絕。加上營與營之間，實在太接近了，所以一點私隱也沒有。剛好碰到一班慶祝生日的住客，我們更是整晚沒睡過。温馨提示，記得帶耳塞，洗頭水沐浴露。唯一加分位是水上活動兩天內任玩。', 'language': 'zh_HK', 'translate_content': 'Take a blue taxi outside the Tung Chung MTR station to Langgao Changan, you can find it for 80 yuan. At 3:30, the staff can take care of us as soon as possible. Go play water sports immediately after changing your shirt. Valuables can be placed in the locker provided for free. At about 6:30 in the evening, the staff came to prepare the barbecue grill. The food was good, but at this price, I would rather open the oven for 250 yuan and bring the food to cook. It would be better and more abundant. Maybe it’s autumn and there are many insects but not as many mosquitoes as you imagined. I have never used mosquitoes to be afraid of water. In addition, there is actually a construction site not far from the camp, so there is noise early in the morning. The camp was near the road, and the noise of cars was endless. In addition, the camp is too close, so there is no privacy at all. I just met a group of guests celebrating their birthdays, and we never slept all night. Warm reminder, remember to bring earplugs, shampoo and shower gel. The only bonus point is that water sports activities can be played within two days.', 'translate_language': 'en_US', 'need_translate_button': True, 'has_reply': False, 'reply': None, 'review_image': '第一次在klook預訂大南非營，klook客務很好夠耐心及解決問問速度快。第一次玩浪高長岸戶外營，聖誕節價錢營算可以，套票只包了床，枕具，早餐，水上活動，天氣冷放棄水上活動，營內大部都是外籍員工，外籍員工態度就有少少.....😞慢，預訂時早餐原本寫有牛油麵包、火腿、雞蛋、德國香草腸、茄汁豆，咖啡或茶。凍飲加$5, 即磨咖啡加$15 ，但去到話改了腿蛋三文治，咖啡，茶，連即磨咖啡都沒有，改嘅原因係想我哋食得方便啲🤔但我又唔覺食番原本寫個啲又幾唔方便☹️。營入面消費頗貴，入面好多基本野都無，好似洗手液，食用餐具，熱水，紙巾，雪櫃無。唔想自己帶入去，可以係入面比錢租或者買，但如果唔想比人劏，自備帶入去平好多。洗手間其實係戶外公廁，有熱水，有廁紙，衛生程度尚可，比起出面公廁好好多。至於床鋪尚算乾淨，整齊，不過因為係帳幕，完全唔隔音。整體一般，但節日志在有地方成班人聯歡，燒下野食都好開心。', 'language': 'zh_HK', 'translate_content': "This is the first time I booked the South Africa camp at klook. There is a bit of attitude.....😞Slow, the breakfast was originally written with butter, ham, eggs, German vanilla sausage, beans in tomato sauce, coffee or tea when booking. Add $5 for cold drinks, $15 for instant coffee, but I changed the sandwiches when I went, coffee, tea, and even instant coffee. The reason for the change is that I want to eat more easily but I don’t even feel it. Fan originally wrote a little bit convenient ☹️. The consumption of noodles in the camp is quite expensive. Many noodles are basically non-existent, like hand soap, tableware, hot water, paper towels, and refrigerators. If you don't want to bring it in by yourself, you can rent it or buy it with money, but if you don't want to compare it to others, it is much better to bring it in. The toilet is actually an outdoor public toilet, with hot water and toilet paper, and the sanitation level is fair, much better than the public toilet. As for the bed, it is clean and tidy, but because it is a tent, it is not soundproof at all. 'rating': 60, 'content': '價錢方面，比其他staycation來說不算便宜，尤其像我們只是單純住宿而沒有玩水上活動。另外當初還沒有留意原來直接在該營地網站預訂便宜百多元，幸好當時有其他折扣足以抵銷差價有餘。現時klook預訂價已減至與該網站一樣。
交通方面，從巴士站步行往接待處只需數分鐘路程，頗方便。
設施方面，我們沒有額外預訂燒烤套餐，但營地仍有免費提供爐具及2枝石油氣可作燒烤/火鍋用，可自備食物過來。營地最初提供的營燈不夠光，我們要特地返回接待處更換，新的一盞光度十足。
說到露營車，遠距離拍照還可，但近距離看有頗多污漬。營車內非常細小，床已佔用大多數位置，廁所與浴室共用，並沒有位置可以放毛巾或乾淨衣服而不被淋濕。車內衛生情況則不太理想，冷氣機上相當多塵，廁所地板綑了整條黑邊，床上有蟻。可能天氣較涼，反而沒有蚊。
環境方面，露營車附近環境開揚，沙灘大而人不多，但要留意牛糞，以及剛剛在營地範圍外面的蛇洞，我們親眼目睹有蛇出現。
翌日提供的早餐不錯，對着沙灘與大海吃更是寫意。', 'language': 'zh_HK', 'translate_content': 'In terms of price, it is not cheap compared to other staycations, especially if we are just staying and not playing water sports. In addition, I did not notice that booking directly on the camp site was 100 yuan cheaper. Fortunately, there were other discounts that were enough to offset the difference. The current klook booking price has been reduced to the same as the website. In terms of transportation, it takes only a few minutes to walk from the bus stop to the reception, which is quite convenient. In terms of facilities, we did not book an additional barbecue package, but the camp still provides free stoves and 2 sticks of LPG for barbecue/hot pot, and you can bring your own food. The camp light provided by the camp was not light enough at the beginning, so we have to return to the reception area to replace it. The new one is full of brightness. Speaking of camping vehicles, taking pictures from a distance is okay, but there are a lot of stains at close range. The inside of the camp is very small, the bed already occupies most of the space, the toilet is shared with the bathroom, and there is no place to put towels or clean clothes without getting wet. The sanitation in the car is not ideal. There is quite a lot of dust on the air conditioner, the toilet floor is tied up with black edges, and there are ants on the bed. It may be cooler, but there are no mosquitoes. In terms of environment, the environment around the campervan is open and the beach is large and there are not many people. But pay attention to the cow dung and the snake hole just outside the camp area. We have witnessed snakes appearing. The breakfast served the next day was good, and eating against the beach and the sea was even more enjoyable.', 'translate_language': 'en_US', 'need_translate_button': True, 'has_reply': True, 'reply': {'id': 120465, 'content': '感謝您支持預訂KLOOK。有關您對營地環境及設施所寫下的意見，我們已轉達給有關供應商知道，以便作出日後的改善，為客人提供更舒適衛生的露營體驗。針對您的訂單，很抱歉因價格上的差異讓您感到失望，我們的服務專員將協助進行相關退款，並以電郵與您聯絡後續事宜，煩請您留意電子郵箱。期待您的諒解，希望您下次繼續選擇KLOOK預訂活動。', 'translate_content': 'Thank you for supporting booking KLOOK. Regarding your comments on the camp environment and facilities, we have conveyed it to the relevant suppliers to know in order to make future improvements and provide guests with a more comfortable and sanitary camping experience. '兩日一夜南非營，兩日都可以玩水上活動，交通尚算方便，不過去程司機飛站太快，錯過落車，建議上車時同司機講聲或開住google map睇住。下午去到先放低行李就玩，行李都係求其放一邊，有咩貴重野就鎖locker。一去到就是大沙灘，玩了獨木舟及直立板，但其實兩個都不太岩玩，因為浪大，反而滑浪會岩啲，而且佢工具離岸邊都有距離，職員唔會幫你搬，只會一旁打氣。因為平日關係，大約3點職員通知可入房，但我地都玩到5點先入去，順便沖涼，雖然預先已知是流動厠所咁，但衛生還不錯，營內亦夠大，冷氣超夠，但營與營之間好近，如果大聲都會聽到。我地晚餐搭車出番去東涌食，認為選擇會多啲同平啲。第二日早餐提供時間9半-11點，9半去到等左成半個鐘多先到手既三文治。玩直立板回程無啦啦有隻蟹爬上尼，哈哈。', 'language': 'zh_HK', 'translate_content': 'Two days and one night in South Africa camp, you can play water activities on both days. When I went to the big beach, I played canoe and stand board, but in fact, neither of them is very rocky. Because of the big waves, surfing can rock, and the tools are far away from the shore. Due to weekdays, the staff informs you that you can enter the room at about 3 o’clock, but we all go in at 5 o’clock and take a shower by the way. I took a ride to Tung Chung for dinner, thinking that the choices would be more and more the same. On the second day, breakfast will be served from 9:30 to 11:30. title: 【KLOOK獨家】Glamping Farm Resort 豪華露營體驗
reviews:
[{'id': 6777631, 'author': 'Meng Yew', 'date': '2021-12-30 11:32:59', 'avatar': '350f3f56--e-m.jpg', 'author_id': 104028765, 'rating': 80, 'content': "We spent 2 nights and were offered to switch to Pasir Ris instead, which was close to the beach. The tent came with 2x double bedder and 1x single air mattresses with pillows and blankets. An air conditioner and swivel floor fan was provided along with a table and 4 chairs. The tent itself is new and well decorated with Christmas decorations. On the outside, there's a large awning in front of the tent. A light with insect zapper is provided.

The staff there were very friendly and attentive. There's a shared restroom there, with showers and toilets. You will need to bring your own soap, shampoo and toilet paper.

For food and drinks, you could order via delivery services and from the staff there for simple things like mineral water and snacks.

The individual BBQ area is in front of the chalets and you could either bring your own equipment or top up to use theirs.

We brought along our own food, water, furniture and equipment so we were fairly self sufficient for 3 days. 

It gets bright and hot in the tent from 8 am till about 5 pm, so you'd probably want to spend more time outside near the trees, prawning centre or the beach during the day. Or just relax and not do anything 😉

None}, {'id': 6766820, 'author': 'Joshua', 'date': '2021-12-27 16:23:48', 'avatar': '3f0de454--e-j.jpg', 'author_id': 102997062, 'rating': 20, 'content': 'Pictures say 1000 words and you’re looking right at them below. This swingle of an experience would’ve mad Bernie Madoff impressed. What I thought was going to be a private, romantic experience under the stars was more like staying at a refugee camp. Without going into all of the details. We arrived at 3pm and our tent wasn’t tied down or set up yet. It gets very hot inside the tent which we expected so we turned on the AC which caused the tent to enclose as you can see in the first picture. It took them 3 hours to get someone to mail down the tent before it started raining. I had purchased the bbq pit & bbq package for an additional $80. The food you can see in the 4th picture it wasn’t more than $10 worth of food which you can get at a FairPrice. The bbq itself we weren’t able to cook on and the $1 hotdogs we were given burned. Complete waste of $80 which I tried to just cancel and they wouldn’t allow it. Save your money and do not buy any of the extras. I had also reserved the date night package which I ended up canceling as it was going to take them an additional 2 hours to set up. It came with a “free” $40 snack basket with cheese! Looks that slides cheese it came with. All of the snacks must’ve costed no more than $10 all purchased from a value store. The ac unit leaked the entire night which they didn’t have a replacement for because they must’ve suckered everyone else into this “experience” and were sold out. By the time we woke up in the morning the entire floor was soaked. The 5 star review that shows the BBQ grills was the family across from us and somehow they got a proper grill as we got what you see in picture 5. There’s at least food stalls and a shop where you can buy drinks because you’re gonna need alcohol to make you feel better about the $300 you just wasted. If you’re looking for an experience that you will NEVER forget, this is it.', 'language': 'en_BS', 'translate_content': 'Pictures say 1000 words and you’re looking right at them below. Generally  it was a fun experience, camping in Kranji Farm Resort, away from civilisation. Air cooler worked well at night, but it was quite tough to battle the heat in the day. 

Pictures shown looks nicer than in actual, but it was expected since this is supp to be camping in the wild. 

The maintenance of the campsite (shared with go glamping) could be improved instead of tools and items strewn everywhere. Tents were spaced quite closely tog. Bbq pit was a separate sheltered area next to the tent, and occupied by the staff in the daytime.

Facilities-wise, there's an old public toilet with cold shower nearby, a prawning area, eateries, vending machines and an atv circuit. Paid parking within the farm resort or along road outside for free.

There's no WiFi, but area has reception for your mobile data. In any case, take the time to bond with your family instead.", 'language': 'en_SG', 'translate_content': "Went with my wife and 3 kids (7, 5 and 3). Firstly, the check in time was at 3pm, but I arrived at 4pm. The staff told me that the tent haven’t set up yet due to rain, hence ask me to wait at another tent area for her to set up. I am holding a lot of things, no place to put down my luggage and it’s raining, it is very frustrating.

Secondly, while I was sitting down and wait for the staff at the area that she instructed me to. Suddenly I receive a call from the boss, raising her voice with the first sentence of “this tent belongs to another lady, you shouldn’t sit in it”. Her attitude was super bad. She showed the worst attitude towards her customer. Things haven’t set up before 3pm shouldn’t be the customer problem, and this thing should communicate between her and her staff. Clear instruction wasn’t given to me, I waited until 5 pm then can rest, and yet she still being rude 

Thirdly, things that they set up for me was totally different from the picture itself, please look that the photo that I took. The staff told me that that will be no extension for me as no place to put it at my tent. However all other tent comes with extension and one table. They only provide me a very small table inside the tent which can’t even place my food on top. Other people are eating happily outside the tent but I have to hold the food myself and eat inside the tent. As well as due to no extension. no choice I have to place my shoes under the rain. 

I choose to call the boss and see if she can communicate with her staff and at least provide me some table or extension (at least make my stay a little pleasant) She refused to answer my call. After awhile her staff come to me and tell me “if anything u can just tell me, no need to call my boss.” This was very rude and bad, it shouldn’t be a way to treat their customer. 

In a conclusion, the experience was not pleasant and I cannot accept the fact that I paid for SGD300 but receive this kind of service.', 'language': 'en_BS', 'translate_content': 'Highly don’t recommend for this glamping- it was my worst experience ever

title: YHA昂坪圓帳營豪華露營體驗
what_we_love: 帳營外觀為純麻色，遠處看來像是一個迷你馬戲團帳幕，且帶點波希米亞的簡樸風格。喜歡的話，更可自備三角小彩旗、LED串燈等裝飾，自行佈置帳營，增添個人風格。物料方面，則用上防水防潮的帆布，就算是潮濕天氣也不用怕。旅舍內亦有浴室和設有冰箱的廚房供住客使用，Campers可自備食材，與家人朋友玩玩「煮飯仔」，在閃爍星空下享受露營大餐。

title: 嘉義｜阿里山露營：2天1夜星空帳篷住宿＆無菜單料理
reviews: [{'id': 6382577, 'author': 'HSIN JUNG', 'date': '2021-05-02 19:31:36', 'avatar': '66eb086af12a42074fe41f59e9214dfe.jpg', 'author_id': 3867987, 'rating': 80, 'content': '四個朋友一起去，CP值較高，兩個人的話可能會覺得太貴。環境優美，有慢活之感，晚上有星星跟螢火蟲可以觀賞。晚餐很讚！\n唯一的缺點是晚上冷熱水不好調節，不是太冷就是太熱，用很久才洗好澡。\n烘培麵包和水沖咖啡的體驗活動，雖然不是從0開始做，但也是不錯的小小體驗。', 'language': 'zh_TW', 'translate_content': 'Four friends go together, the CP value is higher, if two people, it may feel too expensive. The environment is beautiful, with a sense of slowness, and there are stars and fireflies to watch at night. The dinner was great! The only disadvantage is that the hot and cold water is not easy to adjust at night, either too cold or too hot, and it takes a long time to take a good bath. title: 科拉德(Kolad)夜宿河畔露營體驗
what_we_love: 科拉德(Kolad)是一個繁榮的小村莊，坐落在賴加德縣的Kundalika河畔。村莊里終年綠意盎然，背後就是雄偉的Sahyadri山脈，這裡有美麗的山谷沼澤與濕地更加增添了它的美麗。現在，你可以輕鬆走進科拉德(Kolad)，在Kundalika河沿岸體驗一把夜宿河畔露營的樂趣！在河邊自己親手搭帳篷，晚上還有熱鬧的篝火晚會和燒烤活動；你還可以跟隨英文嚮導的步伐，在夜晚乘船遊覽Kundalika森林靜謐的壯麗景象，在Kundalika河畔地區步行一探這裡夜晚的秘密。

title: 【2天1夜】Prashar湖徒步露營之旅
what_we_love: 喜馬偕爾邦（Himachal Pradesh）位於印度西北部，坐落在喜馬拉雅山南麓。熱帶季風氣候讓這里四季都適合前來游覽觀賞。初次來到喜馬偕爾邦，不能錯過的旅行體驗要數這裡最負盛名的徒步之旅。從馬恩迪（Mandi）出發，和你的導遊碰面後，乘坐空調私家車或麵包車前往Baggi村，探索印度北邦的當地村莊。一路享受安靜優美的自然風光後，中午到達Baggi，在探索當地保留下來的獨特建築後，開始享用盒裝午餐。短暫休息停留後，啟程前往Prashar湖。徒步跋涉4 - 5小時後，來到湖畔。傍晚在營地搭建帳篷後，和同行好友一起圍坐篝火旁，感受夜幕星空下的靜謐美好。第二天在營地用完早餐後，遊覽湖畔周邊景區，參觀當地印度教寺廟Prashar Rishi，在那裡發現神秘的宗教文化！
reviews: [{'id': 4455106, 'author': 'Vijay Rathnam', 'date': '2019-11-02 12:11:52', 'avatar': '83b3f979--e-v.jpg', 'author_id': 106308790, 'rating': 80, 'content': "it's really amazing event,, trekking through Forest and too the top  of the hill Prashar lake is simply suber .. our guide and the person's who cook us food also neat and so nice... so I will go for another trekking, next year...", 'language': 'en_US', 'translate_content': "it's really amazing event,, trekking through Forest and too the top  of the hill Prashar lake is simply suber .. our guide and the person's who cook us food also neat and so nice... so I will go for another trekking, next year...", 'translate_language': 'en_US', 'need_translate_button': False, 'has_reply': False, 'reply': None, 'review_image': None, 'activity_id': 9149, 'has_admin_display_info': False, 'like_count': 0, 'has_liked': False, 'ticket_id': 22140502, 'package_name': 'Adventure Experience', 'start_time': '2019-09-22T00:00:00Z', 'china_railway_info': None}]

title: 2天1夜齋浦爾野外宿營
what_we_love: 古老的粉色之城齋浦爾，歷史悠久、風情浪漫，除了探訪眾多古蹟之外，還可以來到荒野中，體驗一下過去拉賈斯坦邦的王公貴族們夜宿野外的感受。這將是一次純粹的戶外放鬆之旅，既沒有令人氣喘吁籲的劇烈活動，也不需要長時間的遠離現代社會。下午出發以後，除了刺激有趣的吉普車越野和輕鬆的短途徒步之外，你還可以欣賞到極為壯觀的荒野日落，以及夜間在遠離了光和噪音污染的宿營地，抬頭就是無邊無際的穹蒼，天空上或是皎潔的月亮，或是璀璨的銀河。城市的喧囂早已被拋在身後，周圍一片寂靜，只有靜謐和清風將你環繞。
reviews: [{'id': 823492, 'author': 's', 'date': '2017-12-12 08:45:17', 'avatar': '4765f71c--e-s.jpg', 'author_id': 154921, 'rating': 80, 'content': '行程活動豐富，體驗很棒！', 'language': 'zh_TW', 'translate_content': 'Itinerary is rich, experience is great!', 'translate_language': 'en_US', 'need_translate_button': True, 'has_reply': False, 'reply': None, 'review_image': None, 'activity_id': 7653, 'has_admin_display_info': False, 'like_count': 0, 'has_liked': False, 'ticket_id': 0, 'package_name': '', 'start_time': '0001-01-01T00:00:00Z', 'china_railway_info': None}]
